name: journalistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is typical of the work of journalists (= people who write about news): Her account is journalistically vivid and snappy. Journalistically, one of the frustrations with that story was that few people were prepared to speak on the record.
More examplesFewer examplesJournalistically sound and original news stories about what is happening in the world make up less than half the broadcasts.This week's episode is the most important and contentious journalistically.We were interested journalistically in finding out what had happened to them.
